narrative_directives.action: In Varo's opulent villa, exhausted messengers arrive with shipping reports. Varo studies maps and ledgers with Marcus, his accountant, orchestrating trades before news of delayed grain ships reaches the public markets. Marcus executes the orders with visible unease, understanding they're profiting from Rome's hunger.
